title: Society Tomorrow
description: With its incredible cinematography, Society Tomorrow pays homage to a genre it’s also reinventing. Follow Joshua, Barbara, Glenn, and friends as they attempt to remove their GuardWrists and live free.
quote: I’m ready to accept how special I am.
creator: Garion Brothers
altHero: a woman in uniform and bathed in blue light points a gun offscreen
alt1: Joshua and Barbara hide from two people in full lab jumpsuits
alt2: a man’s wrist is adorned with a tablet screen with green computer code
alt3: another man points a gun and yells
alt4: Joshua with a long beard and glowing red eyes
